The main characteristics and features of Windows 8 
Unified interface of Windows 8 for tablets, laptops and desktop PCs. The main screen of Windows 8 looks the same on tablets, laptops and desktops. The new Metro interface is optional, which means that it can be turned off and replaced with a standard desktop Windows, familiar to us from the beginning of the 90s. The benefits Metro that it is easy and convenient. Perfectly adapted to the touch screen. And in a sense of simplicity and ease of operation is comparable to a conventional tablet. Metro is not no way limits the ability of the user, and the components of its icons and the tiles can be both static images as well as ever-changing dynamic elements, which is useful for a news or weather forecast. After all, the most important thing will always be displayed on the main screen. By the way, the view Aero desktop has not remained unchanged. For example, a color theme will now be dynamically changed and tailored to fit the tone of the current wallpaper.
Intuitive navigation and tightly integrated applications. You can change the location, color, and size of tiles (plitochek that make up the interface Win8 Metro). But, do not worry. No matter how you change the position of the tiles, the overall appearance of the interface does not change. Unlike the majority of applications for smartphones, applications in Windows 8 which are closely related: for example, built-in application album can directly transfer photos to an independent client application Facebook. 
Rethinking multitasking. Multitasking Windows 8 not only helps to simultaneously keep in mind a few computer or tablet applications, but also to share information between running applications. As the clipboard, only better! And multitasking Windows 8 allows you to display multiple applications on the same screen of a smartphone or tablet. Android users and iOS is not even dream! 
One store Windows Store for all devices. All applications for Windows 8 are created using open web standards HTML5, javascript and CSS3, and is not sensitive to the resolution of the screen. This means that the same application will look great on the screen and a huge plasma screen, and on a tiny little screen tablet or mobile phone. 
Backward compatibility with Windows 7. All applications that work on Win7, will work on computers with Win8. A familiar desktop will be available through the tile on the home screen Win8. There also will be put labels call any normal application. 
Ribbons Ribbons in Windows Explorer Windows Explorer. Microsoft tirelessly promotes tape Ribbons, which were introduced in Office 2007 and replaced with a standard set of icons. Ribbons Ribbons will now be integrated into the conductor even Windows Explorer. The users of the old school is unlikely to have to re-learn - most of them anyway used shortcuts and context menu invoked by clicking the right mouse button. As to the newcomers, they adapt to this interface will be easier. In addition, the large icons on the ribbons Ribbons are perfect for touch interfaces, because it is much easier to get a finger.
Assistant Copy Assistant in Task Manager Task Manager. Happened what we did not expect. Recycled clipboard and a task manager, so that Windows 8 has become possible to copy multiple files at once with a fixed sequence, while visually tracking the rate and time to complete the operation. As to the process manager, then all processes in it are now marked with different colors for visual readability. 
Effective use of USB 3.0 and work with ISO-images out of the box. Windows 8 will have access to content ISO-files without having to install additional programs such as Daemon Tools, Alcohol 52% / 120% or so. Also, Windows 8 will offer integrated support for USB 3.0 without the need to install additional drivers. 
Cloud Service Windows-Sync through Live ID. Service recently announced Windows 8 Cloud Connection will be presented in several roles: all applications, settings and personal information can be synchronized with Windows Live. Purchase a new device with Windows, your login with your Live ID, and your familiar working environment is automatically downloaded from the cloud service. Also it makes it easy to access files on a remote computer - to make the connection you just want a single browser. 
"Red button" Windows 8 or the new Windows for 10 minutes. Windows 8 offers two key improvements in terms of safety: Windows 8 Secure Boot prevents the malicious code to be run before booting the operating system. A "red button" Reset Button will reinstall Windows 8 without actually reinstalling, restoring the operating system to its original state just ten minutes. In addition to the "red button" Reset Button, which can cause at boot OS, you can also resort to function Refresh, is reset to zero only very OSes, and does not affect your personal files and installed applications. Among other features - support for UEFI instead of BIOS, full access to Xbox Live, a three-dimensional interface Wind et al.
